## deduplicate() function

Dedupe an array

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function deduplicate<T>(input: T[]): T[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | T\[\] | an array of sourceIds |

**Returns:**

T\[\]

an array with unique items
